description:
David Cronenberg made horror history when he directed the remake The Fly released in 1986. Now, several decades later, the universe he established with The Fly is being revisited by a new director: Nikyatu Jusu. Jusu, who has also been developing a sequel to Night of the Living Dead, is now stepping over to 20th [...]

The post David Cronenberg’s ‘The Fly’ To Receive New Follow-Up Movie In The Same Universe appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: David Cronenberg’s ‘The Fly’ To Receive New Follow-Up Movie In The Same Universe
